text: Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi akuppā me vimutti ayamantimā jāti natthidāni punabbhavo ti
edit: Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi – akuppā me vimutti ayamantimā jāti natthidāni punabbhavo ti

translations.transtext: Knowledge and insight arose to me thus, "My liberation [is] unshakable; this [is my] final birth; now there is no more becoming."
